Includes raw reads and tar files of sequencing files.

Folders included within this directory:

***EWtarfiles : Raw tar files obtained from EW batch

***LGEPtarfiles: Raw tar files obtained from LGEP batch

***EWfasta: Extracted tar files with name change
    --Within each lane folder there is a fastqc folder which has fastqc results for all technical reps from that lane

***LGEPfasta: Extracted tar files with name change
    --Within each lane folder there is a fastqc folder which has fastqc results for all technical reps from that lane
